description.value:
You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder} of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range. Glowing runes appear wherever the &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder} intersects with the floor or other surface.

Choose one or more of the following types of creatures: celestials, elementals, &Reference[fey]{fey}, fiends, or &Reference[undead]{undead}. The circle affects a creature of the chosen type in the following ways:

The creature can’t willingly enter the &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder} by nonmagical means. If the creature tries to use teleportation or interplanar travel to do so, it must first succeed on a &Reference[cha]{Charisma} saving throw.

  • The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets within the &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder}.
  • Targets within the &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder} can’t be &Reference[charmed]{charmed}, &Reference[frightened]{frightened}, or possessed by the creature.
  • When you cast this spell, you can elect to cause its magic to operate in the reverse direction, preventing a creature of the specified type from leaving the &Reference[cylinder]{cylinder} and protecting targets outside it.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 3rd.

materials.value: holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes
